thread.title: Watch Portland's rookie crack the NBA's Top 10 highlight reel
thread.title_full: Watch Portland's rookie crack the NBA's Top 10 highlight reel

title: Watch Portland's rookie crack the NBA's Top 10 highlight reel
text:
Watch Portland's rookie crack the NBA's Top 10 highlight reel 
Pat Connaughton continues to look like a natural. Nick Laham / Getty Oct 26, 2015 at 2:04a ET 0Shares 
Pat Connaughton 's three-point stroke is one of the sweetest in the entire 2015 draft class. The Portland Trail Blazers guard may not get much of an opportunity to show it off this year, but he sure made things count in the preseason. 
The NBA released a highlight reel of the 10 best plays rookies made over the past few weeks, and to nobody's surprise Connaughton made the list with this incredibly clutch three against the Los Angeles Lakers . true 
It would've sent the game into overtime, but Ryan Kelly had to spoil the party by dunking on poor Noah Vonleh with only a couple seconds left in regulation. MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our NBA newsletters. 0
